description: Zone-based behaviors that create interactive areas, triggers, and environmental effects in the game world

alertzone.name: Alert Zone
alertzone.description: Creates a zone that alerts nearby enemies when the player enters it. Can be configured for single or multiple use with customizable alert range and zone height detection.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the alert zone

properties.name: ALERT_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which enemies will be alerted when player enters the zone

properties.name: ALERT_MODE
properties.description: Whether the zone can be triggered multiple times or only once

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Creates a teleportation zone that can transport players to connected locations or other levels. Features multiple teleport effects, level requirements, and spawn marker support.

properties.name: TELEPORT_ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the teleport zone

properties.name: TELEPORT_TYPE
properties.description: Type of teleportation effect

properties.name: TELEPORT_MODE
properties.description: Whether the teleport can be used multiple times

properties.name: TELEPORT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before teleportation occurs

properties.name: TELEPORT_EFFECT
properties.description: Visual effect during teleportation

properties.name: TELEPORT_EXIT_ANGLE
properties.description: Player exit angle upon teleport

properties.name: PARTICLE_NAME
properties.description: Name of particle effect to use for teleportation

properties.name: PLAYER_LEVEL
properties.description: Player level required to use this teleport

properties.name: DESTINATION
properties.description: Whether to teleport to a local location or another level

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global required for using inter-level spawn markers (e.g., MySpawnMarkers)

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME
properties.description: Name of spawn marker for optional spawning

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the teleport at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard or a specific level

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the next level

collect_zone.name: Collect Zone
collect_zone.description: Creates a zone that automatically collects and destroys objects that enter it. Can increment or deduct user global values based on object weight or fixed values.

properties.name: NOTIFICATION
properties.description: Message displayed when an entity is collected

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the entity can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: COUNT_STYLE
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the user global

properties.name: COUNT_TYPE
properties.description: How to calculate the value to add/deduct

properties.name: FIXED_VALUE
properties.description: Fixed value to increment/deduct the user global by

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: User global that will be affected (e.g., MyPoints)

properties.name: ACTIVATE_LOGIC
properties.description: Whether to activate logic connections when an entity is collected

stealthzone.name: Stealth Zone
stealthzone.description: Creates a zone that puts the player in stealth mode while inside. Reduces AI discovery range and displays a stealth icon. Attach to a trigger zone for activation.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the stealth zone

properties.name: DISCOVERY_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which AI enemies can discover the player while in stealth

properties.name: ICON_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the stealth icon image file

properties.name: ICON_POSITION_X
properties.description: X position of the stealth icon on screen (0-100)

properties.name: ICON_POSITION_Y
properties.description: Y position of the stealth icon on screen (0-100)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: DISABLE_WEAPON
properties.description: Whether to disable weapons while in stealth mode

hurt.name: Hurt Zone
hurt.description: Creates a zone that hurts the player over time or once only when they enter the zone. Can also update a specified User Global by the same amount. Features configurable damage amounts, timing intervals, and zone height detection.

properties.name: AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt to the player per damage tick

properties.name: TIMING
properties.description: Time between damage ticks in seconds (multiplied by 1000 internally)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: HurtOnceOnly
properties.description: Whether to hurt once only then destroy the zone

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: User global that will be affected by the same amount as damage (e.g., MyUserGlobal)

heal.name: Heal Zone
heal.description: Creates a zone that heals the player over time or once only when they enter the zone. Can also update a specified User Global by the same amount. Features configurable healing amounts, timing intervals, and zone height detection.

properties.name: AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of health restored to the player per healing tick

properties.name: TIMING
properties.description: Time between healing ticks in seconds (multiplied by 1000 internally)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: HealOnceOnly
properties.description: Whether to heal once only then destroy the zone

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: User global that will be affected by the same amount as healing (e.g., MyUserGlobal)

spawn_locator.name: Spawn Locator
spawn_locator.description: Relocates the player to a designated spawn marker when they enter the zone. Place under the Player Start Marker. Uses user globals to determine which spawn marker to use.

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global required for using spawn markers

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME
properties.description: Name of the spawn marker to relocate the player to

level_zone.name: Level Zone
level_zone.description: Creates a zone that launches a designated level when the player enters. Features multiple launch modes including instant, keystroke, image+keystroke, and video transitions. Supports spawn markers and state reset options.

properties.name: LAUNCH_MODE
properties.description: How the level transition should be triggered

properties.name: IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to optional image file for Image+Keystroke mode

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player enters the level zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard or a specific level

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the new level

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global required for using spawn markers (e.g., MySpawnMarkers)

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME
properties.description: Name of spawn marker to relocate spawn on next map

winzone.name: Win Zone
winzone.description: Creates a zone that triggers a win condition when the player enters. Features multiple ending modes including image and video support, spawn marker integration, and level transitions.

properties.name: NOTES_TEXT
properties.description: Notes text for this win zone (e.g., 'This winzone takes the user to a new level')

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the next level

properties.name: ENDING_MODE
properties.description: Type of ending sequence to display

properties.name: ENDING_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to optional ending image file

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global required for using spawn markers (e.g., MySpawnMarkers)

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME
properties.description: Name of spawn marker for optional spawning

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard or a specific level

ambienceinzone.name: Ambience in Zone
ambienceinzone.description: Creates a zone that plays looped background music or ambient sounds when the player enters. Automatically stops other ambience zones and switches to this zone's audio. Features configurable zone height and optional stop-on-exit behavior.

properties.name: ONLYPLAYINZONE
properties.description: Whether to stop playing the sound when the player leaves the zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

soundinzone.name: Sound in Zone
soundinzone.description: Creates a zone that plays audio from Sound0 when the player enters, and stops other zone audio from playing. Features configurable volume, overlay options, and zone height detection.

properties.name: ONLYONCE
properties.description: Whether to play the sound only once when entering the zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: SoundVolume
properties.description: Volume level for this zone's sound (1-100)

properties.name: OverlaySound
properties.description: Whether to overlay the sound instead of stopping other zone audio

textinzone.name: Text in Zone
textinzone.description: Creates a zone that displays text messages while the player is within the zone. Features configurable text content, display timing, positioning, and multiple display modes.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text to display when player enters the zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: ONLYONCE
properties.description: Whether to destroy the zone after activation

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME
properties.description: How long to display the text in seconds

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: How the text should be displayed

properties.name: PROMPT_POSITION_X
properties.description: X position for display of the prompt text (1-100)

properties.name: PROMPT_POSITION_Y
properties.description: Y position for display of the prompt text (1-100)

videoinzone.name: Video in Zone
videoinzone.description: Creates a zone that plays video content from the Video Slot when the player enters. Features HUD hiding, ambient track control, and skip options.

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: ALLOW_SKIP
properties.description: Whether to allow the player to skip the video

properties.name: PAUSE_AMBIENT_TRACK
properties.description: Whether to pause ambient music during video playback

hud_zone.name: HUD Zone
hud_zone.description: Creates a zone that displays a designated HUD screen when the player enters, then destroys the zone. Attach to a trigger zone for activation.

properties.name: DISPLAY_HUD
properties.description: Name of the HUD screen to display (e.g., 'HUD Screen 3')

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether to spawn the zone at start. If unchecked, requires a switch or other trigger to spawn

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: Launches the player upwards and forward when they enter the zone. Creates a trampoline-like effect with configurable height and velocity. Includes sound effects and automatic player speed management.

properties.name: HEIGHT
properties.description: Height to launch the player upwards

properties.name: VELOCITY
properties.description: Forward velocity multiplier for the bounce effect

disarm_zone.name: Disarm Zone
disarm_zone.description: Removes all weapons from the player's inventory when they enter the zone, then destroys the zone. Perfect for creating weapon-free areas or security checkpoints with configurable zone height and spawn options.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when weapons are disarmed

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the disarm zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

drop_zone.name: Drop Zone
drop_zone.description: Applies fall damage to the player when they drop from within the zone area and within the specified height. Perfect for creating dangerous drop zones or fall damage areas with configurable damage reduction and zone height.

properties.name: DAMAGE_REDUCTION
properties.description: Fall damage reduction value (101 = No Damage)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height above the zone where the drop damage effect is active

properties.name: SPAWN_AT_START
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

electrocute.name: Electrocute
electrocute.description: Creates an electrified zone that damages both players and NPCs when they enter. Features configurable damage, zone height, custom prompt messages, and includes camera shake effects and sound for immersive electrical hazards.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player is electrocuted

properties.name: DAMAGE
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt by electrocution

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the electrocution zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

envirozone.name: Environment Zone
envirozone.description: Creates environmental effect zones that apply various gameplay modifications to the player. Features eight different effect modes including movement restrictions, health loss, weapon disabling, jumping restrictions, sniper simulation, enemy alerts, and flashlight control.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player enters the environmental zone

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Type of environmental effect to apply

properties.name: WALK_RUN_ADJUST
properties.description: Walk/run speed adjustment multiplier (for Effect 1)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the environmental zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

fadezone.name: Fade Zone
fadezone.description: Creates fade in/out effects when the player enters the zone. Perfect for cinematic transitions, teleportation effects, and level loading sequences with configurable fade types, timing, and custom images.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player enters the fade zone

properties.name: FADE_TYPE
properties.description: Type of fade effect to apply

properties.name: FADE_TIME
properties.description: Speed of the fade effect

properties.name: IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Image file to use for the fade effect

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the fade zone above the zone position

properties.name: FADE_OUT_TELEPORT
properties.description: Whether to trigger teleportation after fade out completes

properties.name: TELEPORT_DESTINATION
properties.description: Destination type for teleportation (when FADE_OUT_TELEPORT is enabled)

features: Fade in and fade out effects

flasher.name: Flasher
flasher.description: Creates lightning-like flashing effects on lights with configurable activation modes, timing, and environmental effects. Perfect for creating atmospheric lighting, storm effects, or dramatic lighting sequences.

properties.name: ACTIVATION
properties.description: How the flasher is activated

properties.name: SENSOR_RANGE
properties.description: Distance from player to activate the flasher (for Sensing mode)

properties.name: FLASH_THRESHOLD
properties.description: Flash level threshold for determining flash intensity

properties.name: FLASH_INTERVAL
properties.description: Random interval in seconds added to flash delay

properties.name: FLASH_DELAY
properties.description: Seconds between flash sets

properties.name: ENVIRONMENT_FLASH
properties.description: Whether to include environmental flash effects

freezeplayer.name: Freeze Player
freezeplayer.description: Freezes the player in place when they enter the zone with configurable freeze duration and style. Features two freeze modes: total freeze (camera override) and partial freeze (position lock with limited view angles).

properties.name: FREEZETIME
properties.description: Duration of freeze in seconds (0 = infinite freeze)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the freeze zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: MultiTrigger
properties.description: Whether the zone can be triggered multiple times or destroys after use

properties.name: FreezeStyle
properties.description: Type of freeze effect to apply

properties.name: ViewAngleLimit
properties.description: Lateral view angle limit for partial freeze mode

properties.name: ZONE_TRIGGER
properties.description: Whether the zone triggers other logic connections or IfUsed entities

get_weapon_zone.name: Get Weapon Zone
get_weapon_zone.description: Automatically finds the closest weapon within a specified range and gives it to the player when they enter the zone. Includes ammunition addition and weapon state management with automatic zone destruction after use.

properties.name: SearchRange
properties.description: Range to search for weapons around the zone

properties.name: ZoneHeight
properties.description: Height of the weapon zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: WeaponAmmunition
properties.description: Amount of ammunition to add to the weapon

properties.name: WeaponState
properties.description: Whether the found weapon should be hidden or shown

global_affected_zone.name: Global Affected Zone
global_affected_zone.description: Affects player user globals and health when the player enters the zone. Features configurable effects (add/deduct), timing, and can modify both user global variables and player health with loop sound effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player enters the affected zone

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct values from the target

properties.name: AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct per time interval

properties.name: SECONDS
properties.description: Time interval in seconds between effects

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the user global variable to affect

properties.name: HEALTH_AFFECTED
properties.description: Whether to affect player health in addition to user globals

properties.name: ZoneHeight
properties.description: Height of the affected zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

global_update_zone.name: Global Update Zone
global_update_zone.description: Updates or replaces a user global variable value when the player enters the zone. Supports both text and numeric global types with configurable update values and zone height.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when the global is updated

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the user global variable to update (e.g., MyLocation or MyValue)

properties.name: GLOBAL_TYPE
properties.description: Type of user global variable

properties.name: UPDATE_VALUE
properties.description: Value to assign to the user global variable

properties.name: ZoneHeight
properties.description: Height of the update zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

gravity_zone.name: Gravity Zone
gravity_zone.description: Alters gravity when the player enters the zone with configurable gravity levels, fall rates, and trigger heights. Features multiple trigger types including logic connections, player death, and game win/lose conditions.

properties.name: GRAVITY_LEVEL
properties.description: Gravity level to apply while in the zone

properties.name: FALL_RATE
properties.description: Fall rate multiplier for gravity effects

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the gravity zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: TRIGGER_TYPE
properties.description: Action to trigger when player reaches trigger height

properties.name: TRIGGER_HEIGHT
properties.description: Height at which the trigger action occurs

properties.name: GRAVITY_LIFT
properties.description: Additional lift force applied to the zone entity

hostile_zone.name: Hostile Zone
hostile_zone.description: Creates a zone where the player must remain unarmed. When weapons are drawn, nearby NPCs become hostile within a configurable range. Features dynamic allegiance management and automatic zone destruction.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.default: In hostile zone, keep weapon holstered
properties.description: Text message displayed when player enters the hostile zone

properties.name: HOSTILITY_RANGE
properties.description: Range within which NPCs become hostile when player draws weapons

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the hostile zone above the zone position

inactive_zone.name: Inactive Zone
inactive_zone.description: Creates an inactive zone that activates all linked entities when triggered by another zone or switch. Automatically destroys itself after activation, making it perfect for one-time triggers and chain reactions.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when the zone is activated

landing_zone.name: Landing Zone
landing_zone.description: Creates a landing zone for aircraft vehicles that activates auto-landing capabilities when entered. Features configurable height ranges, logic connections, and global variable management for aircraft landing systems.

properties.name: BASEHEIGHT
properties.description: Lowest height level for zone detection

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Highest height level for zone detection

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

lut_zone.name: LUT Zone
lut_zone.description: Changes the LUT (Look-Up Table) when the player enters the zone. Features three transition types: instant, fade, and incremental with configurable timing and automatic LUT restoration on exit.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when LUT is changed

properties.name: LUT_GROUP
properties.description: LUT group to change to (without .png file extension)

properties.name: TRANSITION
properties.description: Type of LUT transition effect

properties.name: NUMBER_OF_INCREMENTS
properties.description: Number of incremental LUT steps (for Incremental transition)

properties.name: INCREMENT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay between increments in milliseconds

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the LUT zone above the zone position

properties.name: SPAWN_AT_START
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: LUT_RESET_ON_EXIT
properties.description: Reset to previous LUT when leaving the zone

properties.name: USE_ONCE_ONLY
properties.description: Destroy the zone after use

npc_remove.name: NPC Remove
npc_remove.description: Removes NPCs when they enter the zone with three different removal styles: instant, fade, and timed. Features configurable removal timing, notifications, and automatic zone destruction after use.

properties.name: NOTIFICATION
properties.description: Text message displayed when an NPC is removed

properties.name: REMOVE_STYLE
properties.description: Style of NPC removal effect

properties.name: REMOVE_TIME
properties.description: Time in seconds for timed removal (for Timed style)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the NPC removal zone above the zone position

npcinzone.name: NPC in Zone
npcinzone.description: Detects when NPCs of a specific type enter the zone and triggers actions. Features configurable NPC type filtering, notifications, and automatic zone destruction after activation.

properties.name: NPC_TYPE
properties.description: Type of NPC to detect in the zone

properties.name: NOTIFICATION
properties.description: Text message displayed when an NPC enters the zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the NPC detection zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

plrinzone.name: Player in Zone
plrinzone.description: Creates a re-triggerable zone that detects when the player enters and triggers events. Features configurable delays, multi-trigger options, sound volume control, and logic connections.

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the player detection zone above the zone position

properties.name: MULTI_TRIGGER
properties.description: Whether the zone can be triggered multiple times

properties.name: DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds before triggering the event

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: SoundVolume
properties.description: Volume level for the trigger sound (1-100)

readiness_zone.name: Readiness Zone
readiness_zone.description: Arms or disarms the player when they enter the zone. Features configurable weapon modes, custom prompt messages, and automatic zone destruction when the player leaves.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when the player enters the readiness zone

properties.name: WEAPON_MODE
properties.description: Whether to arm or disarm the player

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the readiness zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

remover_zone.name: Remover Zone
remover_zone.description: Removes named entities when the player enters the zone with three different removal styles: instant, timed, and fade. Features configurable removal timing, notifications, and automatic zone destruction.

properties.name: NOTIFICATION
properties.description: Text message displayed when entities are removed

properties.name: ENTITY_NAME
properties.description: Name of the entity/entities to remove

properties.name: REMOVE_STYLE
properties.description: Style of entity removal effect

properties.name: REMOVE_TIME
properties.description: Time in seconds for timed removal (for Timed style)

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the remover zone above the zone position

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

slip.name: Slip
slip.description: Creates a slippery zone that affects player movement with configurable velocity and counter-force. Features dynamic slip mechanics based on player input and automatic slip angle management.

properties.name: VELOCITY
properties.description: Slip velocity multiplier for player movement

properties.name: COUNTER_FORCE
properties.description: Counter force to slow down slip movement

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player is in the slip zone

toxiczone.name: Toxic Zone
toxiczone.description: Creates a toxic zone that damages players and NPCs over time. Features two effect types (gas and radiation), protection system integration, user global variable management, and configurable damage rates.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text message displayed when player enters the toxic zone

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Type of toxic effect to apply

properties.name: DAMAGE
properties.description: Damage per second inflicted by the toxic zone

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height of the toxic zone above the zone position

properties.name: TOXIC_TO_NPC
properties.description: Whether NPCs are affected by the toxic zone

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: User global variable to affect (e.g., MyUserGlobal)

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the zone spawns at level start or requires external activation

properties.name: GLOBAL_AFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the user global variable

watercontrol.name: Water Control
watercontrol.description: Control water height when activated by switch or zone. Can raise or lower water levels, change water color, and control NPC drowning behavior.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the water control is activated

properties.name: ACTION
properties.description: Whether to raise or lower the water level

properties.name: ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to raise or lower the water level

properties.name: ADJUSTMENT_SPEED
properties.description: Speed at which water level changes

properties.name: NPC_DROWNING
properties.description: If enabled, NPCs will drown when under water level

properties.name: LEVEL_OVERIDE
properties.description: If enabled, starts level from water start level

properties.name: WATER_START_LEVEL
properties.description: Optional water start level

properties.name: CHANGE_COLOR
properties.description: If enabled, changes water to specified RGB values

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_R
properties.description: Red component of water color

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_G
properties.description: Green component of water color

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_B
properties.description: Blue component of water color

videoscene.name: Video Scene
videoscene.description: Triggers video playback from trigger zones or switches. Features skip control, HUD management, and automatic cleanup. Perfect for creating cutscenes, tutorials, and interactive video content in games.

properties.name: ALLOW_SKIP
properties.description: Whether players can skip the video. Yes = allows skipping, No = video must be watched completely.

features: Compatible with trigger zones and switches

steps: Set up video slot with your video file
Connect to trigger zone or switch
Configure logic connections for post-video actions
Test video playback and skip functionality
Verify HUD and radar behavior during playback

imagepanel.name: Image Panel
imagepanel.description: Creates an interactive image display system with multiple overlays and timed animations. Features configurable image sets, overlay sequences, timing controls, and multiple activation methods. Perfect for storytelling, tutorials, cutscenes, and interactive displays.

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the image panel

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player can interact with the image panel

properties.name: POSITION_X
properties.description: X position of the image panel on screen

properties.name: POSITION_Y
properties.description: Y position of the image panel on screen

properties.name: SCALE
properties.description: Scale/size of the image panel display

properties.name: ASPECT_RATIO
properties.description: Whether to maintain aspect ratio (On = preserve ratio, Off = stretch to fit)

properties.name: OVERLAYS
properties.description: Number of overlay images to display in sequence

properties.name: OVERLAY_TIME
properties.description: Time in seconds between each overlay appearance

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME
properties.description: Total time in seconds the image panel is displayed

properties.name: IMAGE_BASE
properties.description: Base path for image files

properties.name: IMAGE_SET
properties.description: Name of the image set folder containing panel and overlay images

properties.name: REVIEWABLE
properties.description: Whether the image panel can be reviewed/replayed (Yes = can be replayed, No = one-time display)

features: Multiple activation methods (E key, trigger zones, switches)
Sound effects for overlays and voice-overs

steps: Configure use range and prompt text
Set up image positioning and scaling
Set up image base path and set name

checkpoint.name: Checkpoint
checkpoint.description: A checkpoint system that saves the player's position when they enter the zone and restores them to this location when they die. Features configurable zone height, sound effects, automatic zone removal, and logic connections. Perfect for creating save points, respawn locations, and progress markers in games.

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: Height above the zone at which the player can trigger the checkpoint

steps: Configure zone height for checkpoint triggering
Position the zone in your game world
Test player entry into the checkpoint zone
